mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, password, nick_name 'nickName', post_code 'postCode', county, address, phone_number 'phoneNumber', email, remark, create_time 'createTime' FROM user
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( `name`, password, nick_name, post_code, county, address, phone_number, email, remark, create_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{postCode}, #{county}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{remark}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET `name` = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, post_code = #{postCode}, county = #{county}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, remark = #{remark}, create_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE email = #{email}
